project_descr: A comprehensive programme for facilitating greater engagement of the diaspora in Albania's socio - economic development.

outputs.output_descr: The Brain Gain Programme seeks to counter the economic and social effects of the "brain drain," and develops ways and incentives to encourage highly skilled professionals to return to Albania or to contribute in a number of ways to development in the country.
donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
